EmailTemplate.description: Internal notification to BNF Recipients of BNF submission for Approval process
EmailTemplate.name: BNF Approvals: New BNF record submitted notification for Recipients
EmailTemplate.subject: BNF Submitted: {!BNF2__c.Sales_Org_Code__c} : Opp. #{!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c} for {!Opportunity.Account} : {!BNF2__c.Product_SAP_Code__c}
